mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactions (amount, status, event_id) VALUES (#{amount}, #{status}, #{event.eventId});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM transactions t INNER JOIN events e ON t.event_id = e.event_id INNER JOIN cards c ON e.card_id = c.card_id WHERE c.card_number = #{cardNumber};
SELECT * FROM transactions t INNER JOIN events e ON t.event_id = e.event_id INNER JOIN cards c ON e.card_id = c.card_id INNER JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT * FROM transactions t INNER JOIN events e ON t.event_id = e.event_id INNER JOIN cards c ON e.card_id = c.card_id INNER JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE e.datetime BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to} AND u.user_id = #{userId};
